name: The selfish animal.
motif: Animals ask God to make people mortal because people would be too numerous and step on the animals, deprive them of their food and habitat, or because the animals want to feast on the human corpses.
Mythemes:
Animals ask God
Make people mortal
Reasons:
People would become too numerous
People would step on animals
People would deprive animals of their food and habitat
Animals want to feast on human corpses
